Documentation in Jupyter Notebooks
==================================

.. image:: images/vor_idea.jpg
   :width: 700   


The following Jupyter notebooks contain several small examples of how to go about using the functions and methods in `hexagons.`
They can be thought of as Cookbook recipes and for quick reference.

1. D1_Documentation_Basics_of_creating_Hexagons_and_Grids
2. D2_Documentation_Hexagon_Interior_Polygons
3. D3_Documentation_Hexagon_Point Method
4. D4_Documentation_`Hexagon.line()` Method
5. D5_Documentation_Colors
